Services

Your car deserves the utmost care from a workshop specialized in repairing and servicing cars of all kinds, where the experience extended over many years and the quality of work that cannot be competed through the most modern equipment in Jerusalem.

Electrical repairs

Provide your car with maintenance and repair services that include batteries, electrical systems, wiring, lighting, and electronic devices.

Mechanical repairs

We handle all types of problems using high-quality spare parts and the latest technology.

Battery maintenance

Our specialized technicians provide various services, including battery inspection and testing, as well as maintenance and replacement.

Air conditioning

We inspect critical components like the compressor, condenser, ventilation systems, and check/refill the refrigerant level.

Accident Maintenance

Your car is in safe hands with AHM. We specialize in car accident maintenance service.

Our Work

Welcome to the world of accuracy and quality! The management of AHM Car Maintenance Company looks forward to being the first company in the city of Jerusalem to enjoy distinguished services according to international standards and a reliable partner for all car owners. We promise you a unique experience and an exceptional journey when you visit us.
